headline: First, I need to understand the structure of the CSV they want. It starts with a header row: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Then each subsequent row represents one article with those four fields enclosed in double quotes and separated by semicolons.

headline: Breaking News: Major Discovery in Ancient Ruins
author: Dr. Maria Gonzalez
content: In a groundbreaking discovery, archaeologists have uncovered ancient artifacts that shed new light on early civilizations.
